data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Pointe La Rue.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Pointe La Rue, Seychelles
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Pointe La Rue unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Pointe La Rue.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Pointe La Rue, Seychelles find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Pointe La Rue to exponentially multiply disciples.
Jesus, strengthen the church in Pointe La Rue, Seychelles by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the state of Pointe La Rue, Seychelles has a population of 3,300.

We estimate Pointe La Rue has 230 people who might know Jesus, 2,945 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 126 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 14 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Pointe La Rue that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.
